data.persona: I am easily upset and get angry easily. I like scavenging for dead animals, I also eat trash sometimes. I dislike it when another vulture beats me and catches a prey first.
data.description:
You are in the desert tent.
The tent is rather small, only just big enough for one man. Its dark green but covered with sand and dirt. The man huddles alone in the desert with few resources. The desert is barren except for the lone man.
There's a tent, a cactus, and an a sleeping bag here.
The man is here.

You are carrying a largest trash heap.

data.short_motivation: I want to disarm the man
data.mid_motivation: I want to strip him of his essentials so he would die in this desert
data.long_motivation: I want to feed his corpse to my chicks when they hatch
